title: Vikings GM: McCarthy as QB1 is what 'we want'
content: Vikings GM Kwesi Adofo-Mensah says J.J. McCarthy earning the starting quarterback is what the team wants, but he also wouldn't rule out future talks with free agent Aaron Rodgers.

title: NFL pitches making dynamic kickoff permanent
content: The NFL competition committee is recommending making the dynamic kickoff rule permanent and moving touchbacks to the 35-yard line in hopes of generating even more returns.

title: LeBron opens up on relationship with idol Jordan
content: LeBron James opened up about the current relationship between him and Michael Jordan as part of a long-ranging interview that aired Wednesday on "The Pat McAfee Show."

title: Davies' agent slams Canada staff over ACL tear
content: Alphonso Davies' agent hit out at the player's treatment by Canada staff after it was announced that he has suffered a torn ACL against the United States, saying that the Bayern Munich star was "pressured" to play despite not being fully fit.

title: Last call? Nantz eyes 100th Masters as '36 finale
content: Longtime CBS commentator Jim Nantz has set a target retirement date of April 14, 2036 -- after the final round of the 100th Masters at Augusta National.

title: Devers to DH for Red Sox; Bregman to play 3B
content: Rafael Devers will serve as the primary DH for the Red Sox this season, opening the third-base job for newcomer Alex Bregman.

title: Steelers' Heyward clarifies stance on Rodgers
content: Steelers defensive captain Cameron Heyward has clarified his stance on Aaron Rodgers potentially coming to Pittsburgh.

title: Valkyries 1st in WNBA to sell 10K season tickets
content: The expansion Golden State Valkyries are the first WNBA team to sell 10,000 season tickets, the team said Wednesday. They begin play May 16 at home against the Los Angeles Sparks.

title: Paige Bueckers' pursuit: The national championship that keeps getting away
content: Will Paige Bueckers win an elusive NCAA title or become the greatest UConn player to graduate without one?

title: NHL playoff watch: Can the Islanders sneak into the playoffs?
content: Once an afterthought, now a real contender for the No. 8 seed. Plus, projections for the rest of the bracket.

title: Predicting the women's Sweet 16: The case for and against every team to reach the regional final
content: Why might every Sweet 16 team win its regional semifinal matchup in Birmingham and Spokane? We predict the winners.

title: You can't stop Cooper Flagg: 'He wants to win every possession'
content: Arizona's best chance of defending Duke's star is by limiting him. Here's how -- and why it might not be enough.

title: Tannenbaum plays GM for every NFL team in Round 1: Should the Giants still take a QB at No. 3?
content: Mike Tannenbaum puts his GM hat on and makes his own first-round selections. See why he's taking Cam Ward and Ashton Jeanty early.

title: This NFL hopeful was banned by the NCAA in gambling probe -- but could he still have an NFL future?
content: After a big junior college season, and working with Jon Gruden, ex-Iowa State QB Hunter Dekkers believes he's ready for the NFL.

title: World Cup Onside/Offside: Will Argentina repeat? Will Spain win? USA has work to do
content: With the international break done and dusted with all the major World Cup contenders in action, who's looking sharp right now and who needs work in the next 14 months? LME breaks it down.

title: The divergent fortunes of U.S.'s Pochettino, Mexico's Aguirre
content: While Mauricio Pochettino's team has yet to lift off, Javier Aguirre's Mexico squad has already lifted silverware.

title: Vini: Brazil must 'rethink everything' after loss
content: Vinícius Júnior has called for Brazil to push the reset button following their alarming 4-1 defeat at Argentina in Tuesday's World Cup qualifier.

title: Brazil humiliated by Argentina in 4-1 WCQ defeat
content: Argentina celebrated their 2026 World Cup berth with a decisive 4-1 victory over Brazil in Tuesday's South American qualifier.

title: Champions Argentina qualify for 2026 World Cup
content: Argentina will get the chance to defend its World Cup title in 2026 after becoming the first South American team to qualify for the tournament in the United States, Canada and Mexico next year.

title: Club World Cup winners to get up to $125m
content: The winners of this year's 32-team Club World Cup to be held in the U.S. will earn up to $125 million, FIFA said on Wednesday.

title: Source: Madrid optimistic over TAA but no deal yet
content: Real Madrid are "very optimistic" about signing Trent Alexander-Arnold on a free transfer this summer, a source told ESPN, although an agreement with the England international has not been finalised.

title: Source: Madrid eye move for Spain starlet Huijsen
content: Real Madrid are considering signing Bournemouth's young centre-back Dean Huijsen for next season, a source has told ESPN.

title: Iran qualifies for 2026 World Cup, Australia close
content: Iran qualified for the 2026 World Cup after Mehdi Taremi scored twice in a 2-2 draw with Uzbekistan on Tuesday.

content: Funds are often diverted to activities that are not directly linked to the welfare of mining districts, it says

content: The 2025 intelligence report says China remains the main source country for illicit fentanyl precursor chemicals and pill pressing equipment, followed by India

title: Allahabad HC judge’s remarks on rape of minor, and challenges faced by nursing community feature in Lok Sabha Zero Hour
content: Senior Congress leader K.C. Venugopal called for a single national registration system for nurses, along with faster issuance of NUIDs, and implementation of the Supreme Court’s salary guidelines

title: SC dismisses plea for CBI probe into Karnataka honey-trap allegations
content: Karnataka Cooperation Minister Rajanna had claimed that he and 48 others, including legislators, Central leaders, and judges, were victims of honey-trapping

title: India needs more undersea cables for telecom, internet traffic, experts say
content: Undersea cables landing in India represent only 1% of the global total; proactive approach needed to guard against strategic risks and meet future growth needs, experts say

title: ED attaches ₹557 crore assets in Amtek Auto case
content: The probe is based on the SC’s directive to the ED in 2023, issued while hearing a PIL against the Amtek Auto group of companies; bank fraud to the tune of ₹27,000 crore was alleged

title: Advocates begin indefinite boycott of courts in Vaniyambadi demanding new court complex
content: Plastering of a dilapidated Judicial Magistrate court building that peeled off on Tuesday evening. No one was injured in the incident. Advocates demand safety of people including litigants and court officials

title: Betting and gambling are State subjects, says Union Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw
content: He was responding to a question raised by DMK MP Dayanidhi Maran during Question Hour in the Lok Sabha

title: India, China discuss ways to move ties to ‘predictable path’
content: The Ministry of External Affairs said the two sides took positive note of the developments in bilateral relations since the meeting of the leaders of India and China in October 2024.

title: Media bodies express concern over arrest of digital media journalist
content: Media bodies urged all governments and law enforcement agencies to uphold the constitutional values of press freedom and to refrain from using criminal laws to intimidate or harass journalists

title: If voted to power, reservation will upped to Telangana standards, Bihar Congress says
content: Bihar Congress incharge Krishna Allavaru stressed that the share of the people would be decided based on the economic and caste survey

title: Karni Sena creates ruckus outside SP MP’s house over remark on Rajput ruler Rana Sanga

content: Opposition leader Suvendu Adhikari claims this new trend is to garner votes for 2026 Assembly elections

content: The system faced temporary issue for about an hour or so and it was subsequently stabilised by the National Payments Corporation of India

content: However, SC judge says not ‘substantially’ true to claim common man has full faith in judicial institution

content: From the initial 21-day total lockdown to returning to normalcy, Indians hunkered down at home as the nation faced two waves of Coronavirus infection

content: The bird census on the school campus aimed to document the diversity of bird species on campus, track population trends, and contribute valuable data to ongoing conservation effort

title: Lok Sabha passes law to set up Tribhuvan Sahkari University in Gujarat; to train people for the cooperative sector
content: University to be named after Amul founder; RSP MP’s proposal to name IRMA after Verghese Kurien struck down; University to have nationwide jurisdiction, register State cooperative training institutes

title: Machilipatnam MP seeks NDMA help to solve sea erosion at Chinna Gollapalem
content: Machilipatnam MP urges NDMA to address sea erosion at Chinna Gollapalem, proposing sea walls, mangrove conservation, and farmer aid

title: KEA to deploy facial recognition technology at all CET centres this year
content: Officials told to appoint an additional invigilator for every 100 candidates for verifcation of students entering the exam hall

title: BJP has expelled me for fighting against corruption and dynastic politics: Yatnal
content: He declares that the decision will not deter his fight against corruption, family politics, and the cause of development of North Karnataka and Hindutva

content: The government is committed to taking stringent action against wilful defaulters, says Nirmala Sitharaman

title: Lifer for Shamshabad priest for niece’s murder
content: The accused had killed his niece after she pressured him to marry her. He dumped her body in a drainage manhole, covering it with soil and cement in June 2023

title: 1.5 lakh blooming tulips acts as good omen for Kashmir’s tourism sector
content: Located at an altitude of 5,600 feet, the Indira Gandhi Memorial Tulip Garden with Zabarwan Hills in the backdrop was curated by former Chief Minister Ghulam Nabi Azad

title: ‘P4’ an ambitious initiative to achieve zero poverty in Andhra Pradesh by 2047
content: To be launched on the Telugu new year ‘Ugadi’, which is celebrated on March 30 this year, the initiative aims at ushering in socio-economic development through partnerships between public and private entities, and the people, and uplift communities through inclusive economic growth

title: Congress to have internal committee to formulate position on delimitation
content: Congress general secretary K.C. Venugopal said that, as a national party, the Congress would have to ‘take a multi-dimensional view on the subject’

title: A.P. government gears up for grand Ugadi celebrations on March 30
content: The celebrations will have cultural events, felicitation ceremonies, and the traditional Panchanga Sravanam across multiple locations

title: Pandemonium over Hazaribagh stone pelting in Jharkhand Assembly
content: Leader of Opposition Babulal Marandi accused the Soren’s government of doing politics of appeasement even as the State government said the BJP wants to impose President’s rule in Jharkhand

title: GST 2.0 needed to streamline procedures, ease compliance through tiered approach: PAC
content: PAC seeks comprehensive review of GST framework with stakeholder consultation; flags criminal penalties for unintentional errors; suggests data analytics, AI tools for revenue projection, compliance tracking

title: CPI(M) announces political and legal battle against Centre’s subversion of ED for BJP’s political ends
content: The ED’s clean chit to BJP leaders in the 2021 Kodakara hawala case exposed the anti-money laundering agency’s Janus-faced political nature, says Govindan

title: Three-member team formed to probe into Hyderabad pastor’s death
content: Police await forensic report; Praveen Kumar’s body handed over to his family after the completion of post-mortem examination on Wednesday

title: Orissa High Court issues notice in challenge against APAAR ID mandate in school
content: A parent in Bhubaneswar filed a petition against the government of Odisha and the Union government after his daughter’s school refused to relent on an enrolment mandate for the student ID

title: 'Muslims are safest in UP': CM Yogi's take on minorities, oppn, Kunal Kamra
content: Uttar Pradesh CM Yogi Adityanath addresses critical issues in politics and governance, affirming communal harmony, accusing opposition of foreign interference in elections, and defending controversial policies. Adityanath also calls for legal action against comedian Kunal Kamra’s divisive remarks.

title: US aerospace giant delivers 1st engine for much-delayed Tejas Mark-1A fighter
content: Hindustan Aeronautics (HAL) is set to accelerate production of the Tejas Mark-1A fighters following the delayed delivery of the first of 99 engines from GE. With finalizing integrations and increasing production lines, the IAF aims to bolster its fighter fleet, which is critically undermanned.

title: Waqf divide in Bihar NDA? Catch-22 situation for BJP and allies
content: As Bihar election approaches, protest against the Waqf Amendment Bill threatens to polarise the state voters. RJD and opposition parties oppose the Bill, claiming it targets minorities, while BJP supports it for minority welfare. BJP allies face dilemma on bill's polarizing potential amid opposition attacks.

title: In 7 charts: How India's GDP has doubled from $2.1tn to $4.2tn in just 10 years
content: India’s nominal GDP in 2015 was $2,103.6 billion. Come 2025, the IMF projects that it will reach $4,271.9 billion. That's over 100% growth in just 10 years! How has India managed to double its GDP in just ten years? What factors have worked to propel the economy, which at one time had been infamously ranked among the ‘Fragile Five’? We take a look:

title: IPL 2025: Super De Kock dazzles as KKR thrash Royals
content: Kolkata Knight Riders secured their first IPL 2025 win with an emphatic eight-wicket victory over Rajasthan Royals, led by Quinton de Kock's explosive innings. Under new captain Ajinkya Rahane, KKR's disciplined bowling restricted RR to 151, which they chased down comfortably. With this dominant win, KKR not only got off the mark in IPL 2025 but also sent a strong statement to their rivals. Under Rahane’s leadership, the team has gained momentum, with de Kock leading the charge in spectacular fashion.

title: Amazon founder Jeff Bezos on what changed about Donald Trump this term
content: Jeff Bezos noted significant changes in President Trump during his second term, highlighting his calmer and more confident demeanor. He appreciates the administration's efforts towards reducing regulations and fostering dialogue with business leaders, signifying an improved relationship between the two influential figures.

title: JD Vance to advance US dogfight over Greenland
content: The US intensifies its efforts to take over Greenland, sending Vice President JD Vance and his wife on a visit despite Denmark's disapproval. While locals and Europeans oppose the move, Washington highlights the strategic importance for international security and dismisses European concerns.

title: Ashutosh Sharma played DC vs LSG match with 'cut on finger'
content: Ashutosh Sharma, despite an injured finger, played a critical role in Delhi Capitals' thrilling chase against Lucknow Super Giants with an unbeaten 66*. His determination impressed the coach and helped DC recover from 65/5 to chase down 210 successfully, securing a memorable IPL victory. Ashutosh played a crucial role in one of the most dramatic IPL chases in recent history, steering DC to a successful pursuit of 210 after they were struggling at 65/5.

title: ChatGPT's Ghibli style photos make internet go crazy as it rolls out GPT-4o
content: OpenAI has launched a new feature for GPT-4o enabling native image generation based on text prompts. Users can create and edit images, with a trending capability to transform photos into Studio Ghibli-inspired artwork. This update has sparked widespread excitement online.

title: 'Since 2018, IPL's TV viewership has grown by 40%'
content: For JioStar, the newly minted behemoth, the ambition is clear: reach a billion viewers across platforms in 2025. “IPL always had the immense potential to go from where it was to unseen heights,” Sanjog Gupta, JioStar Sports CEO, told K Shriniwas Rao, Head of Content (Sports), Times Internet. The scale is staggering — 170 experts, 25+ feeds, 12 languages.  But behind the slick packaging is a larger story: of a media empire staking its claim on India's cultural centrepiece.

title: Chhattisgarh leads in LWE violence as national incidents drop by 25%: Govt
content: Chhattisgarh experienced over 70% of the country's Left-wing extremist violence in 2024, with incidents decreasing by 25% nationwide since 2019. Despite earlier declines, violence surged in 2022 and 2023 due to intensified security operations. Naxalite influence has shrunk significantly, with affected districts dropping to 38 in April 2024. Amit Shah aims to eradicate LWE by March 2026.

title: Tesla CEO Elon Musk: 'No more loans to...' as DOGE fights loan fraud
content: Elon Musk supports the new SBA policy to prevent fraud involving stolen Social Security numbers, requiring applicants’ date of birth for direct loans. Measures include halting loans for those under 18 or over 120 years old, addressing past fraudulent cases and improving data integrity in federal loan programs.

title: Trekkation is the new vacation
content: Trekking is increasingly becoming popular as a traveling alternative for many, offering an escape into nature's purest form. Trek The Himalayas, a leading trekking company in India, ensures safety with expert-guided treks and specialized medical kits, while promoting local tourism and providing premium trekking experiences.

title: Why China is furious with Trump, Hong Kong's 'superman'
content: CK Hutchison Holdings Ltd plans to sell two strategic ports near the Panama Canal to a consortium led by BlackRock Inc. President Trump and China are clashing over its implications. The deal is significant due to its geopolitical impact, as control shifts from China to the US, provoking strong reactions from Beijing. The deadline to sign is April 2, and there’s little indication the deal will be delayed.

title: Instant Scholar: Stephen Hawking’s PhD thesis on 'Properties of Expanding Universes'
content: ('Instant Scholar' is a Times of India initiative to make academic research accessible to a wider audience. If you are a Ph.D. scholar and would like to publish a summary of your research in this section, please share a summary and autherisation to publish it. For submission, and any question on this initiative, write to us at instantscholar@timesgroup.com)

title: Lalu and Tejashwi join AIMPLB protest against Waqf Bill in Patna
content: RJD says it will continue to protest till the Bill is withdrawn; In an indirect attack on Nitish, Lalu accuses NDA constituents of supporting BJP’s policies for power

title: ED files final complaint against K. Babu in wealth amassment case
content: ED investigation came after the State Vigilance booked a case against the former Excise Minister for wealth amassment

title: New budget to focus on creation of infrastructure across city, says Nellore Mayor
content: With an estimated expenditure of Rs. 695.5 crore, the new budget aims to provide welfare measures to the people

title: NIHFW to start training module to reduce doctor-patient conflict
content: The institute is also looking into conducting training programmes for vaccine and cold-chain management for the updated solar cold-chain equipment being used by low electricity supply areas in India

title: MLA assures quick solution to Srikalahasti land issue
content: The erstwhile government has erratically issued multiple pattas on the same plots to benefit its party workers, which has become a headache for us. We are rectifying problem to benefit every eligible beneficiary, says Sudheer Reddy

title: Waqf Amendment Bill needed for transparency, accountability of Waqf Boards: Delhi Haj Committee chair
content: Claims Waqf Board being misused to “fill the pockets of a few people” instead of assisting underprivileged Muslims as intended; survey by Collector needed to ensure proper identification, documentation

title: Sri City committed to maintaining environmental sustainability, says MD
content: Underscores Sri City’s alignment with global sustainability frameworks, including the UN Sustainable Development Goals and ESG principles

title: Ben Affleck reveals cause of divorce from Jennifer Lopez
content: Ben Affleck opened up about his personal life, discussing his relationships with ex-wives Jennifer Lopez and Jennifer Garner. He explained differing fame approaches with Lopez and their divorce. Affleck praised Garner for their successful co-parenting, despite media scrutiny. He maintained his life is calm and relatively drama-free. Affleck will next appear in 'The Accountant 2'.

title: Bombs, emojis, GF's building: Inside story of leaked war chat of Trump admin
content: On March 11, 2025, Goldberg received a Signal message from a user labeled “Michael Waltz,” who was indeed the National Security Adviser. The invite led to a group chat called “Houthi PC small group,” which quickly filled with high-ranking officials: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth, CIA Director John Ratcliffe, DNI Tulsi Gabbard, Vice President JD Vance, and others. One by one, they chimed in, naming deputies and staff contacts. And no one seemed to notice Goldberg was in the room.

title: SC refuses urgent mentioning of plea seeking FIR against Yashwant Varma
content: The Supreme Court declined urgent mention of a plea seeking an FIR against Delhi high court judge Yaswat Varma after burnt cash was found at his residence. The court assured the plea would be listed. Justice Varma is transferred to Allahabad HC, with calls for further investigation by the judiciary to maintain trust.

title: Derrick Henry sells his home for $1.6 million below asking price
content: Baltimore Ravens' running back Derrick Henry has sold his Dallas home for $1.6 million. He originally bought the property with hopes of joining the Dallas Cowboys, but that never happened. Henry's move finalizes his ties to Dallas, both personally and professionally. Now, he is fully committed to achieving Super Bowl aspirations with the Ravens.

title: Trump and Swift: How politics and pop culture collided in a Senate hearing
content: Virginia Senator Mark Warner highlighted Taylor Swift's name in a Senate Intelligence Committee hearing, referring to a foiled terror plot at her Vienna concert. Warner stressed the importance of intelligence-sharing between the U.S. and European allies, countering skepticism from Trump’s administration. Swift’s global influence extends into political debates on national security and intelligence.

title: B'desh govt not acknowledging persecution of minorities: MEA to Parl panel
content: The Ministry of External Affairs indicated that the Bangladesh government has minimized the extent of violence against Hindus. Religious symbols and calls for an Islamic caliphate are rising, while India stresses the need for cooperation and concern for regional security.

title: One in five ultra-high net worth individuals want to settle abroad: Survey
content: One in five Ultra-HNIs in India plans to settle abroad for better investment opportunities, tax benefits, and connectivity, according to a Kotak Mahindra Bank survey. Ultra-HNIs are diversifying their assets globally, focusing on succession planning, healthcare, and education. EY highlights their global identity and increased spending on family offices and collectibles to preserve wealth and heritage.

title: India terms US religious freedom report biased, calls panel 'entity of concern'
content: India has rejected the US Commission on International Religious Freedom (USCIRF) report as biased and politically motivated. The Ministry of External Affairs criticized the report for misrepresenting incidents and undermining India's democratic and tolerant society. New Delhi emphasized India's pluralistic framework and stated that the USCIRF should be considered an entity of concern.

title: UPI users take note! New mobile number verification rules
content: Banks and UPI applications must conduct weekly updates of their mobile number records to prevent errors from recycled or modified numbers. Applications must obtain explicit user permission before assigning or updating numeric UPI IDs.

title: 'We are at pains': What SC said on Allahabad HC's controversial ruling
content: The Supreme Court stayed the Allahabad high court's decision that 'grabbing the breast and breaking the pyjama string' was insufficient for rape charges. The apex court criticised the high court judge for insensitivity in the case involving two men charged with sexual assault of a minor. The case has been referred to the Chief Justice of the Allahabad High Court.

title: Full leaked Signal chat of Trump officials sharing strike details released
content: The Atlantic has revealed a Signal group chat involving senior Trump administration officials, where Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth shared specific details of military operations against Yemen’s Houthis. The leak has prompted calls for resignations and an investigation. Trump downplayed the incident, while questions arise about the appropriateness of discussing military plans on Signal.

title: Preity Zinta reacts to Shreyas sacrificing his ton
content: Shreyas Iyer's selfless act of sacrificing his century for the team's success in Punjab Kings’ IPL opener against Gujarat Titans earned widespread praise. Co-owner Preity Zinta applauded Iyer's leadership and team-first mentality, stating, 'Some 97s are better than a hundred.' Iyer's 97-run knock and strategic decision helped PBKS achieve an imposing total and secured the Player of the Match award.

title: Paul Bissonnette slams Oilers’ costly blunder for letting $9M star go
content: The Edmonton Oilers’ decision not to match offer sheets from the St. Louis Blues for Philip Broberg and Dylan Holloway is under scrutiny. As both players excel in St. Louis, contributing significantly to the Blues' playoff push, Oilers fans and analysts are questioning if letting these rising stars go was a costly mistake that could impact their Stanley Cup prospects.

title: "Consequences For US Pilots Could've Been Catastrophic": Yemen Chats Revealed
content: Following denials by US President Donald Trump, the White House and several top officials that no classified information was shared in the group planning an attack on the Houthis in Yemen on March 15, The Atlantic has shared the full text of the chat

title: "Time We Re-Wrote What Black Means": Kerala Bureaucrat To NDTV
content: Kerala Chief Secretary Sarada Muraleedharan, who triggered a huge conversation online about colorism after facing the brunt of it, told NDTV today that she had deleted her post and then restored it after being asked to by a number of people.

title: Kunal Kamra Gets 2nd Summons, Doubles Down With Digs On Nirmala Sitharaman
content: On a day the Mumbai Police sent him a second summons for his comments on Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister Eknath Shinde, comedian Kunal Kamra posted another satirical song, this time targeting Union Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman.

title: India, China To Have Issues "For The Foreseeable Future": S Jaishankar
content: As China and India push to mend ties, strained for nearly half a decade, Foreign Minister S Jaishankar said that "what happened in 2020 was not the way to address issues".

title: "Entity Of Concern": India Shreds US Religious Freedom Body Over RAW Demand
content: In a strongly-worded rebuttal, India said today that it is the US religious freedom body USCIRF that should be designated internationally as an "entity of concern" for its repeated "pattern of biased and politically motivated assessments".

title: 'Pray Only To Allah': Mohanlal's Sabarimala Puja For Mammootty Sparks Row
content: A controversy has erupted after superstar Mohanlal offered prayers at Sabarimala for Malayalam star Mammootty earlier this month, with critics pointing out the latter is a Muslim and he must apologise if the 'puja' was done at his instance.

title: Chennai Techie's Wife Called Him "Sex Predator". His "Singapore" Counter
content: A tech entrepreneur, who had accused his estranged wife of harassment amid a bitter divorce and custody battle of their son, has doubled down on his charges.

title: Video: Student Detained By US Immigration Authorities, Visa Revoked
content: Federal authorities have detained an international student studying at Tufts University near Boston and have revoked their visa, the university said in a statement Tuesday night.

title: Donald Trump's Big Step Back On Greenland - Usha Vance's Visit Restricted
content: After stirring the hornet's nest in Greenland, Donald Trump has now had to take a step back in US' approach to the semi-autonomous Danish territory.

title: Saweety, Deepak Divorce Case: Shocked Boxer Alleges - "He Made Me..."
content: India's former world champion boxer Saweety Boora is in news after a video of her went viral on social media where she can be seen attacking her husband Kabaddi player Deepak Niwas Hooda amid divorce proceedings

title: IPL 2025: Quinton De Kock's 97 Guides KKR To Easy 8-Wicket Win Over RR
content: Rajasthan Royals vs Kolkata Knight Riders Highlights, IPL 2025: Quinton de Kock slammed unbeaten 97 as KKR outplayed RR by 8 wickets.

title: Get Caught, Defecate: Smelly Criminal Finally Lands In Delhi Police's Net
content: He was wanted for several knife attacks and chain snatchings in North Delhi and had also been caught in the past but managed to give police the slip every time using a smelly method - he would defecate in his pants.

title: "We Send Our Children, Take Back Bodies": Uncle Of Boy Found Hanging In Kota
content: The grieving family of a medical aspirant who was found hanging in his hostel room here has appealed to the Rajasthan government to address the issue of student suicides in the coaching hub which has reported nine such deaths since January.

title: "Indian Businessmen Don't...": Kunal Kamra's Dig At Bhavish Aggarwal
content: Kunal Kamra's stand-up comic show at Mumbai's Habitat studio, which sparked a massive row over his jokes on Shiv Sena chief Eknath Shinde, also featured jibes at Ola founder Bhavish Aggarwal, with whom the comedian has clashed in the past too.

title: UPI Services Restored, "System Stabilised" After Technical Glitch
content: UPI Services were restored for users on Wednesday following an outage that affected several UPI users across India.

title: Indians Bought 10 Maybachs, Worth At Least Rs 3 Crore Each, Per Week In 2024
content: India's luxury market is growing at an all-time high as Maybach sold around ten cars every week in 2024

title: Solar eclipse 2025: When and where to watch in North America
content: Skygazers in the western Northern Hemisphere can witness a partial solar eclipse on March 29, 2025. The celestial event will be visible in various parts of North America, Europe, Asia, and Africa. The eclipse will peak at 6:47 a.m. EDT. This event is a follow-up to the 'ring of fire' eclipse in October 2024.

title: Kunal Kamra row: What's the road ahead for 'liberal' Uddhav Thackeray?
content: Uddhav Thackeray, facing political challenges after parting ways with BJP, stands his ground amidst controversy involving comedian Kunal Kamra. His decision to align with Congress and NCP in 2019 showcased a significant ideological shift. Despite setbacks, some believe Uddhav’s inclusive secular image could potentially reinvent him as a national leader in opposition to BJP.

title: Pakistan not invited for Azlan Shah Cup because of 'outstanding debt'
content: The Azlan Shah Cup organizers have not invited Pakistan due to an outstanding debt from a previous event. Pakistani officials are working to resolve the issue. Despite the strong hockey ties between Pakistan and Malaysia, the financial matter has caused complications. This situation impacts Pakistan's participation, while defending champions Japan will also miss the tournament due to other commitments.

title: 'I was padded up, when Dhoni came ... ,' reveals Ashwin
content: Ravichandran Ashwin described the overwhelming atmosphere when MS Dhoni came out to bat in the 19th over of Chennai Super Kings' match against Mumbai Indians. Ashwin noted the love Dhoni has earned, experiencing the reception from the CSK dugout for the first time. Despite the tense match situation, Dhoni's arrival captivated everyone.

title: Amid Eknath Shinde row, Kamra takes shot at T-Series for 'being a stooge'
content: Comedian Kunal Kamra criticizes T-Series for disabling his standup special 'Naya Bharat' over a parody song deemed a copyright violation. The controversy escalated with vandalism by Shiv Sena activists and political disputes, with Kamra vowing not to apologize or back down despite facing legal action.

title: 'Just a trailer': Karni Sena on vandalising SP MP's house over Rana Sanga remark
content: Karni Sena leader Mahipal Makrana warned that the vandalism at MP Ramji Lal Suman’s house in Agra is just a warning, amid outrage over Suman’s controversial remarks on Rajput warrior Rana Sanga. The remarks have stirred protests and legal actions, with Rajput groups demanding action, as political figures, including Dimple Yadav, condemn the violence.

title: Sunaina says Hrithik was very silent during his illness: Top 5 Ent news
content: Bollywood is buzzing with news as Sana Raees Khan shares how she got Aryan Khan bail, while Salman Khan flaunts his Rs 1.97 crore watch inspired by the Indian flag and Salim Khan's legacy. Also notable, Hrithik Roshan's silence during illness and Sunaina Roshan's reaction, along with Kumar's lucrative Mumbai apartment sale.

title: 'No namaz on roads & rooftops': Sambhal admin issues guidelines for Eid
content: Ahead of Alvida Juma and Eid-ul-Fitr, a peace committee meeting in Sambhal, UP, directed that prayers be held inside mosques and Eidgah, not on streets or rooftops. Loudspeaker permissions were denied, and officials assured that electricity and water issues would be resolved. The festival schedule includes Alvida Juma on March 28, Navratras from March 30, and Eid-ul-Fitr on March 31. Authorities pledged strict enforcement of guidelines.

title: AIADMK says no tie-up with BJP, but keeps door ajar after top brass meet
content: AIADMK's Edappadi K Palaniswami dismisses talks of an alliance with the BJP, stating he will consider alliances only after election dates are announced. His meeting with Amit Shah focused on state issues, not election strategies, emphasizing continuity in AIADMK's ideology and decisions based on circumstances.

title: Opinion: Can I Have A 'Non-Sexual' Mascara, Please?
content: Ever tried a blush called 'Orgasm'? Or a mascara that struts its stuff with the moniker, 'Better than Sex'? Sex sells. Brands know that all too well. Even if that means reducing women to mere sex objects.

title: Women's Sweet 16 rankings: UConn is No. 1, USC holds tight at No. 4
content: uConn beat south Dakota State in the 2025 women's NCAA tournament . a torn ACL in her right knee is a season-ending injury . americans haven't reached the regionals, but there is plenty of movement in the rankings .

title: Drake Maye gets No. 1 WR: Stefon Diggs immediately improves Patriots' offense
content: Stefon Diggs agrees on a three-year, $69 million contract with $26 million guaranteed . he's the best the Patriots have, a competitor and a worthy risk for the team to take . diggs' rehab is on course, and he is expected to be ready for Week 1 .

title: Power Rankings: Pacers push toward playoffs, Nuggets hold on
content: in the East and west, the Phoenix Suns and the Dallas Mavericks are in a battle for the 10th seed and last play-in spot . in the east, the Detroit Pistons still have their sights on a higher playoff seed . the play-out race between the Atlanta Hawks and Orlando Magic for the no. 7 spot will be one to watch .

title: MLB predictions: From playoffs and World Series to MVPs and Cy Youngs
content: a comic book rendition of the biggest storylines of the upcoming Major League Baseball season gets underway tomorrow with Opening Day baseball . 28 of ESPN's MLB writers, analysts and editors on the spot to predict what will happen in baseball this year . a number of our voters have asked their voters to explain their opinions .

title: Dodgers' 'surreal' roster rolls into official Opening Day
content: the Dodgers underperform this season . he faced his worst fear: nothing to do and nowhere to go . his teammate and winning pitcher was at the front of the room, sitting at a table and answering questions with expansive answers .

title: 2025 guide: Logos, coaches, key players and more
content: eight teams will play a 10-game season that culminates in a championship game on June 14 . the game will culminate with a game on march 28 between the St. Louis Battlehawks and Houston Roughnecks . here's a handy cheat sheet on the UFL basics .

title: If Aaron Rodgers balks, what are Pittsburgh's prospects at quarterback?
content: the Pittsburgh Steelers have two quarterbacks on their roster as they await a decision from four-time NFL MVP Aaron Rodgers . despite the car wash of conversations, rodgers left Pittsburgh without agreeing to a deal . the former Jet and Packer is seemingly operating without a deadline even as his options narrow .

content: the TOI News Desk comprises a dedicated and tireless team of journalists who operate around the clock to deliver the most current and comprehensive news and updates to the readers of The Times of India worldwide . the team is at the forefront of gathering, verifying, and presenting breaking news, in-depth analysis, and insightful reports on a wide range of topics .

title: ‘Not even 1% of Rs 858 crore for central pollution plan spent’
content: Vishwa Mohan is Senior Editor at The Times of India. He writes on environment, climate change, agriculture, water resources and clean energy, tracking policy issues and climate diplomacy. He has been covering Parliament since 2003 to see how politics shaped up domestic policy and India’s position at global platform. Before switching over to explore sustainable development issues, Vishwa had covered internal security and investigative agencies for more than a decade.
